roleset.name: allow, let
roleset.note: ENABLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'enable' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Revised by Olga. (from enable.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Each of the Class C warrants will enable the holders to purchase one share of common stock at $5.50.
example.arg: Each of the Class C warrants
to purchase one share of common stock at $5.50
